description:
Following his late father`s will, Yuu Tagami travels across the world to New York City in order to find a former student of his father`s, Dr. Wave. Upon meeting the man however, Yuu becomes entangled in a vast conspiracy to keep New Austral Island, a mysterious landmass that suddenly appeared in the South Pacific, a secret.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ニューヨークサスペンス
